testcase.name: TC14 Webuniversity sayfasinda istenen gorevleri yapar
testcase.system-out: Given kullanici "webUrl" anasayfaya gider...................................passed Then Login portal gorununceye kadar asagiya iner............................passed And Login portal butonuna tiklar............................................passed And acilan ikinci window a gecer............................................passed And Username kutusuna deger yazdirir........................................passed And Password kutusuna deger yazdirir........................................passed Then webUniversity login butonuna basar.....................................passed And 5 saniye bekler.........................................................passed And Popup'ta cikan yazinin "validation failed" oldugunu test eder...........passed And 3 saniye bekler.........................................................passed And Ok diyerek Popup'i kapatir..............................................passed Then ilk sayfaya geri doner.................................................passed And ilk sayfaya donuldugunu test eder.......................................passed And tum sayfalari kapatir...................................................passed
